feed.title: Comments on Testing the Not-So-Testable HttpWebResponse
feed.subtitle: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

entry.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
entry.content:
Glad it was useful! ðŸ™‚

One thing to note is that I didn’t implement all the properties and headers, only the ones I needed at the time. If you run into additional ones you need, feel free to add them (and send me the changes or do a PR) or ask and I’ll see if I can add them in. I’m actually using this for another project somewhere and may have some additional options that I never committed to this main repo, I’ll have to check.

entry.title: By: Adam W
entry.content: Dude! That’s so awesome! I snaffled your GitHub code, I couldn’t get the async stuff mocked, banging my head on a wall… then your code just works, beautiful! Really appreciate it. Awesome! ðŸ˜€
